title: Crohn's and Colitis Center Gift Fund
description: To provide support for the Crohn's and Colitis Center at the University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus.  Support includes research, education, programming, travel, salary and other needs as determined by the fund manager.
marketingContent: To provide support for the Crohn's and Colitis Center at the University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus. Support includes research, education, programming, travel, salary and other needs as determined by the fund manager.
